channel.title: Admins & co-owners, not lose items on death
channel.description:
How do i make it so admins - owners don't lose items on death.
All help is appreciated.

item.title: Admins & co-owners, not lose items on death
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

hmm… no i don’t know what else to do i’m really stumped o.o maybe if i can see your client.java code it will help me… if you want, you can send it to me in a PM or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins & co-owners, not lose items on death
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

are you sure that’s all of it? maybge you missed some lines or something? well all i can suggest is this…
declare a new void and call it death() and add this in it:

[code]
if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {

        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
     currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
              refreshSkills();
     toX = 3278;
     toY = 3175;
     specialAmount = 100;
     specAttack();
     AtkPray = 0;
     StrPrayer = 0;
     DefPray = 0;
     RangePray = 0;
     MagePray = 0;
     PrayHeal = false;
     ProtItem = false;
     ProtMage = false;
     ProtRange = false;
     ProtMelee = false;
     Redemption = false;
     Retribution = false;
     Smite = false;
     Chivalry = false;
     Piety = false;
     isSkulled = false;
     //lastSkull = 0;
     skulltime = 0;
     headIcon = 0;
     turnpray();
     getHead();
     heightLevel = 0;
     playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
     currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
     deathStage = 0;
  setAnimation(65535);
     prayOn = false;
     sM("Oh dear you have died!");
              resetOtherAtk();
     //PlayerHandler.resetAround(absX, absY);
     /*if (destruct)
     {
            absX = 3088+misc.random(3);
            absY = 3500+misc.random(3);
     }*/
     savegame(false);

[quote] if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
if(playerRights < 1) {

        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
     currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
              refreshSkills();
     toX = 3278;
     toY = 3175;
     specialAmount = 100;
     specAttack();
     AtkPray = 0;
     StrPrayer = 0;
     DefPray = 0;
     RangePray = 0;
     MagePray = 0;
     PrayHeal = false;
     ProtItem = false;
     ProtMage = false;
     ProtRange = false;
     ProtMelee = false;
     Redemption = false;
     Retribution = false;
     Smite = false;
     Chivalry = false;
     Piety = false;
     isSkulled = false;
     //lastSkull = 0;
     skulltime = 0;
     headIcon = 0;
     turnpray();
     getHead();
     heightLevel = 0;
     playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
     currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
     deathStage = 0;
  setAnimation(65535);
     prayOn = false;
     sM("Oh dear you have died!");
              resetOtherAtk();
     //PlayerHandler.resetAround(absX, absY);
     /*if (destruct)
     {
            absX = 3088+misc.random(3);
            absY = 3500+misc.random(3);
     }*/
     savegame(false);
  }[/code]

then replace all your death method with:

if(playerRights < 1) {
death()
}

NOTE: backup your client.java as i have no idea if this will work or not!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Admins & co-owners, not lose items on death
item.dc:creator: @use_are_client use are client
item.description:
@use_are_client wrote:

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) { playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); toX = 3278; toY = 3175; specialAmount = 100; specAttack(); AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; //lastSkull = 0; skulltime = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); getHead(); heightLevel = 0; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); deathStage = 0; setAnimation(65535); prayOn = false; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); //PlayerHandler.resetAround(absX, absY); /*if (destruct) { absX = 3088+misc.random(3); absY = 3500+misc.random(3); }*/ savegame(false); }

thats what i got, now where would i add what you said?

item.title: Admins & co-owners, not lose items on death
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

first have somebody kill you / fight an NPC and die. then get the teleport co-ords and find them in client.java. you’ll probably find something like youdied(), just keep looking and you’ll find it. after that search for the method itself and edit it.

		if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 950 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 3093+misc.random(1);
		toY = 3243;
pvpmode = false;
newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
getNextPlayerMovement();
			client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
if(isclangame == true) {
killerz.callend();
isclangame = false;
team1 = false;
team2 = false;
} else {
if(playerRights < 2) {
		youdied();

that’s what i have in mine.

item.title: Admins & co-owners, not lose items on death
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

In your Death method, add something like

if (playerRights >= 2) {
/*
execute everything normally, except leave out the method tat removes items
*/
} else {
//execute regular code here, for non admins
}
